page.title: 17CLUBS AND LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: In the{Kilmadock Church Hall}meet: Church Choir, Womens' Guild, Friends and Neighbours Club, Mothers and Toddlers Group, Playgroup and Badminton Club.{For children:}Sunday School, Crusaders, Bible Club, Boys' Brigade, Holiday Club and Youth Group. In the{Primary School:}Parents' Association, Keep Fit and Gardening Classes.{For children:}Nature Club. In the{Rural Institute:}W.R.I.,Indoor Bowling,Karate and Angling.{For {children:}Karate, Cubs, Scouts, Brownies,Guides,Angling and Highland Dancing. At{Bowling Green:}Bowls for adults and children. At{Moray Park:}Football and Tennis. In {Masonic Hall:}Masons.
